CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Premium Users relative to Mobile Users?
SRP.A: Premium Users is {below} Mobile Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Premium Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Mobile Users}.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's User Engagement Rate in 1973?
VE.A: Premium Users's user engagement rate in 1973 is {35.56} %.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's User Engagement Rate in 1967?
VE.A: Mobile Users's user engagement rate in 1967 is {6.33} %.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's User Engagement Rate in 1964?
VE.A: Mobile Users's user engagement rate in 1964 is {6.75} %.

VE.Q: What are the user engagement rate of Free Users, Premium Users, and Mobile Users in 1971?
VE.A: Free Users's user engagement rate is {11.94} %, Premium Users's user engagement rate is {32.34} %, Mobile Users's user engagement rate is {5.97} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum User Engagement Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum user engagement rate is {0.56} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum User Engagement Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum user engagement rate is {42.60} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest User Engagement Rate level recorded for Free Users?
What is the lowest User Engagement Rate level recorded for Free Users?
EVJ.A: Free Users's lowest recorded level is approximately {7.63} % in {1978}.

SC.Q: What is the average total User Engagement Rate?
SC.A: The average total user engagement rate is {52.15} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total User Engagement Rate exceed 52.26 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total User Engagement Rate fall between 48.93 and 54.08 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total User Engagement Rate go below 50.75 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1966, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1959 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between 1963 and 1966 was {smaller} than between 1959 and 1973.

NC.Q: Was the total User Engagement Rate in 1967 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total user engagement rate in 1967 was {lower} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1960, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1962 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between 1957 and 1960 was {larger} than between 1962 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1980, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1977?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between 1979 and 1980 was {larger} than between 1963 and 1977.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Premium Users} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Mobile Users, Free Users, Premium Users}.
